moves.1. e4 Nf6: the Alekhine defense: not something, you want to present me on a hot Friday afternoon; especially not with a couple of beers in my system...
moves.8. O-O Bxf3 9. Bxf3 Nxc4: this pawn will bring Black no pleasure...
moves.16... Rxb2 17. Bxa7 Bb4: and then, there is the matter of castling...
this pawn is going on a mission...
moves.28. a8=Q Rxa8 29. Rxa8+ Bf8 30. Bb4 h6: stubborn as hell: that is what you get, with beer in the sun...
moves.33... Qe1+: and my opponent claimed check mate...
moves.34. Bxe1: all completed, in just under 4 minutes: you gotta love this game...
